about.title: About
about.body: We are an independent research lab dedicated to harnessing the power of AI to elevate human productivity in everyday life. Our mission is to create AI-native products that serve as the ultimate assistants for enhancing efficiency, supporting tasks, and freeing up time for more meaningful pursuits. Currently, we are diving into a suite of innovative tools, with our first product already in development.

body.start: Join our small, self-funded, and fully distributed team as we work together to shape the future of AI-powered solutions. Based in Shanghai, China, we are looking for passionate individuals who share our vision.
body.end: If you don't see a position that suits you but feels aligned with our goals, we'd love to hear from you. Please send your resume and portfolio to careers@timelesslab.ai. Your ideas and expertise could be the perfect addition to our team!

contact.title: Contact
contact.body: Got questions or want to collaborate? Reach out to us anytime via hello@timelesslab.ai. We're here to chat!
